title: Concord
headline:
Your best health,
here in Concord
intro: If you don’t already have a Primary Care Provider, it’s important to make an appointment and find an expert you trust to guide your health and refer you to specialty care if needed.

locationsIntro.title: Concord Locations
locationsIntro.content: ChristianaCare Primary Care locations offer a variety comprehensive medical care for adults and children, with a convenient practice for our neighbors in the Concord area. Many locations offer appointments by video, by phone or in-office. Call for details.

locations.title: ChristianaCare Primary Care at Concord Health Center
locations.details: 124 Sleepy Hollow Drive, Suite 203, Middletown, DE 19709
